data.eml:eml: Error cascade in taxonomy: The case of Cardiomya perrostrata (Mollusca: Bivalvia: Cuspidariidae) in Brazilian waters

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Cléo D. C., Sartori, André F., Absalão, Ricardo S. (2017): Error cascade in taxonomy: The case of Cardiomya perrostrata (Mollusca: Bivalvia: Cuspidariidae) in Brazilian waters. Zootaxa 4247 (3): 281-300, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.3.3
